entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Welland
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of ice pellets near midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
